channel.title: Console Command to add Suit hud?
channel.description:
WHen using the command. "Map {mapname}" I load without the suit. Therefore. i cannot see my health. and cannot collect Batteries or use Suit Chargers, The hud is not there.
is there a way to add the HEV Suit WITHOUT Impulse 101?

item.title: Console Command to add Suit hud?
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Did you load a map were there was supposed to be a loadpoint?
Because if thats the case, then it pretty much explains itself.

Read full topic
item.source: Console Command to add Suit hud?

item.title: Console Command to add Suit hud?
item.dc:creator: Prometheus
item.description:
Its only for the maps that start a chapter I think.

Read full topic

item.title: Console Command to add Suit hud?
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
Eh, shouldnt weapons be available when you even use the “map” command?Because in the .vmfs I see a HEV suit, weapons, and batteries.
